description:
This market refers to the Honor of Kings match between eStar Pro and Royal Never Give Up in the King Pro League Stage 2 Group B, scheduled for February 10 at 7:10AM ET.

This market will resolve to "eStar Pro" if eStar Pro wins 3 or more games than Royal Never Give Up in this match.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Royal Never Give Up".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

events.description:
This market refers to the Honor of Kings match between eStar Pro and Royal Never Give Up in the King Pro League Stage 2 Group B, scheduled for February 10 at 7:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "eStar Pro" if eStar Pro win the match against Royal Never Give Up.

This market will resolve to "Royal Never Give Up" if Royal Never Give Up win the match against eStar Pro.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/honorofkings/Main_Page.
events.title: Honor of Kings: eStar Pro vs Royal Never Give Up (BO5) - King Pro League Stage 2 Group B
